languages.text: Дикарь старается не смотреть вам в глаза и делает странный — скорее всего ритуальный — жест при вашем приближении.
The tribesman avoids your gaze and makes a strange gesture — probably some kind of ritual — as you approach.
languages.original_text: Дикарь старается не смотреть вам в глаза и делает странный — скорее всего ритуальный — жест при вашем приближении.

traits.locale_text: The tribesman avoids looking you in the eye and makes a strange gesture, probably a ritual one, as you approach.
The tribesman avoids looking you in the eye and makes a strange gesture, probably a ritual one, as you approach.
The tribesman avoids your gaze and makes a strange gesture — probably some kind of ritual — as you approach.
The tribesman avoids your gaze and makes a strange gesture — probably some kind of ritual — as you approach.
The tribesman avoids your gaze and makes a strange gesture — probably some kind of ritual — as you approach.
The tribesman avoids your gaze and makes a strange gesture — probably some kind of ritual — as you approach.

languages.text: 部族民はあなたの視線を避け、近づくいていくと奇妙なジェスチャーをする―おそらく何らかの儀式だろう。
languages.original_text: The tribesman avoids your gaze and makes a strange gesture — probably some kind of ritual — as you approach.

traits.locale_text: 部族民はあなたの視線を避け、近づくいていくと奇妙なジェスチャーをする―おそらく何らかの儀式だろう。

languages.text: 当你接近这位部落民时，他避开了你的视线，做了个古怪的手势。这可能是某种仪式。
languages.original_text: The tribesman avoids your gaze and makes a strange gesture — probably some kind of ritual — as you approach.

traits.locale_text: 当你接近这位部落民时，他避开了你的视线，做了个古怪的手势。这可能是某种仪式。

languages.text: Les membres de la tribu évitent soigneusement votre regard tout en faisant un geste étrange à votre approche.
languages.original_text: The tribesman avoids your gaze and makes a strange gesture — probably some kind of ritual — as you approach.

traits.locale_text: Les membres de la tribu évitent soigneusement votre regard tout en faisant un geste étrange à votre approche.

languages.text: El miembro de la tribu evita tu mirada y realiza un gesto peculiar al acercarte. Probablemente se deba a algún tipo de ritual.
languages.original_text: The tribesman avoids your gaze and makes a strange gesture — probably some kind of ritual — as you approach.

traits.locale_text: El miembro de la tribu evita tu mirada y realiza un gesto peculiar al acercarte. Probablemente se deba a algún tipo de ritual.

languages.text: Der Stammesmann meidet deinen Blick und führt eine merkwürdige Geste aus, als du dich näherst, vermutlich eine Art Ritual.
languages.original_text: The tribesman avoids your gaze and makes a strange gesture — probably some kind of ritual — as you approach.

traits.locale_text: Der Stammesmann meidet deinen Blick und führt eine merkwürdige Geste aus, als du dich näherst, vermutlich eine Art Ritual.

languages.text: Kabile üyesi, bakışlarından kaçınıyor. Yaklaştığın sırada, muhtemelen ayin gereği tuhaf bir el hareketi yapıyor.
languages.original_text: The tribesman avoids your gaze and makes a strange gesture — probably some kind of ritual — as you approach.

traits.locale_text: Kabile üyesi bakışlarından kaçınıyor ve sen yaklaşırken muhtemelen bir tür ayin görevi gören tuhaf bir el hareketi yapıyor.
